 void save()
          public void save(int score,int levelsCrossed,File f){ try{ PrintWriter pw=new PrintWriter(new FileWriter(f)); java.util.Date dt=new java.util.Date(); pw.println("Score : "+score); pw.println("Levels crossed : "+levelsCrossed); pw.println("Time : "+dt.getHours()+":"+dt.getMinutes()); pw.flush(); pw.close(); } catch(Exception e){} }
